original_text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria, and were edified; and walking in the fear of the Lord, and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost, were multiplied.
korean_text: 그리하여 온 유대와 갈릴리와 사마리아 교회가 평안하여 든든히 서 가고 주를 경외함과 성령의 위로로 진행하여 수가 더 많아지니라

sentences.original_text: throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria
and walking in the fear of the Lord
and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost
